snippet: Paulo Portas, who resigned on Wednesday as Portugal’s foreign minister, rejoined the government on Saturday as deputy prime minister.
lead_paragraph: Paulo Portas, who resigned on Wednesday as Portugal’s foreign minister, rejoined the government on Saturday as deputy prime minister.

headline.main: Seeking to Repair a Rift in Portugal’s Ruling Coalition
headline.print_headline: Seeking to Repair a Rift in Portugal’s Ruling Coalition
